work_units.title: Implement Email and Password Authentication
work_units.what_to_change: auth module, login endpoint, validation logic
acceptance_checks: User can log in with valid email and password
User receives error for invalid credentials

work_units.title: Add Unit Tests for Authentication
acceptance_checks: All authentication tests pass
Edge cases are covered

tasks.title: Implement Email and Password Authentication
tasks.description:
Goal: Implement a secure authentication system using email and password.
Changes: Update the auth module, login endpoint, and validation logic to support email and password authentication.
Acceptance checks: User can log in with valid email and password; User receives error for invalid credentials.

tasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Authentication
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure the authentication functionality is reliable through testing.
Changes: Create and run unit tests for the auth module to cover various scenarios.
Acceptance checks: All authentication tests pass; Edge cases are covered.

items.ac_text: Email address must be unique within the system.

work_units.title: Implement email uniqueness validation
work_units.what_to_change: User registration and update validation logic
acceptance_checks: Email validation logic checks for uniqueness
Validation error message is returned for duplicate emails

work_units.title: Update user database schema for email uniqueness
work_units.what_to_change: User table to add unique constraint on email column
acceptance_checks: Database schema reflects unique constraint on email
No duplicate emails can be inserted into the database

work_units.title: Create tests for email uniqueness validation
work_units.what_to_change: Unit tests for user registration and update scenarios
acceptance_checks: Tests cover cases for unique and duplicate emails
All tests pass successfully

tasks.title: Implement email uniqueness validation
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure that email addresses are unique during user registration and updates.
Changes: Update the user registration and update validation logic to check for email uniqueness.
Acceptance checks: Email validation logic checks for uniqueness; Validation error message is returned for duplicate emails.

tasks.title: Update user database schema for email uniqueness
tasks.description:
Goal: Modify the user database schema to enforce email uniqueness.
Changes: Add a unique constraint on the email column in the user table.
Acceptance checks: Database schema reflects unique constraint on email; No duplicate emails can be inserted into the database.

tasks.title: Create tests for email uniqueness validation
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure that the email uniqueness validation works correctly.
Changes: Develop unit tests for user registration and update scenarios focusing on email uniqueness.
Acceptance checks: Tests cover cases for unique and duplicate emails; All tests pass successfully.

work_units.title: Implement Email Format Validation
acceptance_checks: Validation correctly identifies valid email formats
Validation correctly rejects invalid email formats

work_units.title: Write Unit Tests for Email Validation
acceptance_checks: All test cases for valid emails pass
All test cases for invalid emails pass

tasks.title: Implement Email Format Validation
tasks.description:
Goal: Implement a module to validate email formats.
Changes: Update the email validation module to include regex checks for valid and invalid email formats.
Acceptance checks: Validation correctly identifies valid email formats; Validation correctly rejects invalid email formats.

tasks.title: Write Unit Tests for Email Validation
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure the email validation module works as expected.
Changes: Create a test suite for the email validation module covering various valid and invalid email formats.
Acceptance checks: All test cases for valid emails pass; All test cases for invalid emails pass.

items.ac_text: Corporate domain restrictions must be configurable.

work_units.title: Implement Configurable Domain Restrictions
work_units.what_to_change: DomainRestrictionConfig module, API endpoint for updating restrictions
acceptance_checks: Domain restrictions can be updated via API
Validation checks are in place for domain formats

work_units.title: Update Documentation for Domain Restrictions
work_units.what_to_change: API documentation for domain restrictions configuration
acceptance_checks: Documentation includes examples of how to configure domain restrictions
All endpoints related to domain restrictions are documented

tasks.title: Implement Configurable Domain Restrictions
tasks.description:
Goal: Enable the configuration of corporate domain restrictions via an API.
Changes: Update the DomainRestrictionConfig module and create an API endpoint for updating restrictions.
Acceptance checks: Domain restrictions can be updated via API; Validation checks are in place for domain formats.

tasks.title: Update Documentation for Domain Restrictions
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure that the API documentation reflects the new domain restrictions configuration.
Changes: Update API documentation to include examples and details for domain restrictions configuration.
Acceptance checks: Documentation includes examples of how to configure domain restrictions; All endpoints related to domain restrictions are documented.

items.ac_text: Authentication fails for non-existent email addresses.

work_units.title: Implement email existence check in authentication
acceptance_checks: Return error message for non-existent email
Ensure no authentication occurs for non-existent email

work_units.title: Update authentication tests for non-existent email
acceptance_checks: Test case for non-existent email returns correct error
Test case for valid email still authenticates correctly
dependencies: Implement email existence check in authentication

tasks.title: Implement email existence check in authentication
tasks.description:
Goal: Ensure that authentication fails for non-existent email addresses.
Changes: Update the authentication service endpoint to check for email existence before proceeding with authentication.
Acceptance checks: Return error message for non-existent email; Ensure no authentication occurs for non-existent email.

tasks.title: Update authentication tests for non-existent email
related_task_titles: Implement email existence check in authentication
tasks.description:
Goal: Validate the authentication process with respect to non-existent email addresses.
Changes: Update the authentication test suite to include test cases for non-existent emails.
Acceptance checks: Test case for non-existent email returns correct error; Test case for valid email still authenticates correctly.
